headline: Has The Market Mispriced Chevron After A Flat 2024 Share Performance?
summary: Wondering if Chevron is still a buy at around $152, or if most of the value has already been squeezed out? This breakdown will help you decide whether the current price matches the business underneath. Over the last week Chevron is up about 1.8%, but it is roughly flat over 1 year and only modestly higher year to date at 3.8%, after a bumpy 5 year run that still leaves long term holders with just over 100% total returns. Those uneven moves have come as investors digest shifting energy demand...
